snippet.title: Ship of Heroes Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
The new Ship of Heroes Steam page trailer shows off gameplay. To see more, visit the Ship of Heroes Steam page. The entire video was created from in game footage.

Ship of Heroes is a new superhero sci-fi MMORPG with magic, currently under development. Create your unique avatar and show your heroic side. Select and custom augment your powers as you rise through the ranks. Team up to defeat enemies, or try the hardest content solo, if you dare… Harvest. Craft. Trade. Gain fame, wealth, and power.

Ship of Heroes is created in Epic’s Unreal 4.27. It is currently expected to launch at the end of 2023.
